name: Emergency Parking Only
description:
Parking cars is easy and boring. Parking cars that have no brakes is AWESOME!

The goal of Emergency Parking Only is simple - park your cars within the lines for maximum cash, and smash everyone else's cars out of their spots. Need some extra muscle? Honk your horn while waiting for a new car and summon an ambulance, bank car, ice cream truck, or some other heavy vehicle and shove everyone out of the way.

Emergency Parking Only supports up to four players in any combination of online multiplayer, game controllers from the couch, or even just crowding around the keyboard together.

The game is under active development, with new features, maps, vehicles, and more coming in the future.
